headline: Coating Place Announces Leadership Appointments to Support Next Phase of Growth
summary: As Coating Place celebrates its 50th anniversary, the company continues to build on its long-standing reputation as the industry leader in Wurster-based fluid bed technology for controlled release and taste masking applications.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights McKesson, Cardinal Health, West Pharmaceutical and Align Technology
summary: McKesson, Cardinal Health, West Pharmaceutical, and Align Technology are set to benefit from innovation, aging populations, and rising medical supply demand in 2026.
